main event: A military weather observer at Andersen Air Force Base on Guam sighted an unidentified flying object on November 11, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as a round, blue-green object that was first sighted directly overhead.
The object moved in a straight, northeasterly course at a great speed, changing color from blue-green to blue before disappearing.
The sighting lasted for only 3 seconds.
The object was silent and appeared to be the size of a dime held at arm's length.
The sighting occurred at night with 2/10 cloud cover, and there were no known aircraft in the area.
